subject: [Ip-health] USTR Report on Foreign Trade Barriers, 2007
body:
This week, USTR published its 2007 National Trade Estimate Report on
Foreign Trade Barriers. The main page, which has links to
country-by-country chapters, is here:

http://ustr.gov/Document_Library/Reports_Publications/2007/2007_NTE_Report/Section_Index.html


--
Mike Palmedo
Research Coordinator
Program on Information Justice and Intellectual Property
American University, Washington College of Law
4910 Massachutsetts Ave., NW Washington, DC 20016
T - 202-274-4442 | F 202-274-0659
